mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contact AS "contact", a.phone AS "phone", a.email AS "email", a.content AS "content", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.status AS "status", b.name AS 'org.name', c.name AS 'project.name'
(org_report a left join org b on a.org_id=b.id) left join project c on a.project_id=c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_report( contact, phone, email, content, org_id, project_id, create_time, status ) VALUES ( #{contact}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{content}, #{orgId}, #{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_report SET contact = #{contact}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, content = #{content}, org_id = #{orgId}, project_id = #{projectId}, create_time = #{createTime}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
